name: AI-Driven Governance: Building Smart Assistants for DAOs
description: At ETHChicago, CityDAO presents "AI-Driven Governance," a workshop dedicated to integrating AI with DAOs. Dive into the creation of AI agents designed for enhanced DAO governance. From training tailored models to understanding DAO intricacies, we aim to amplify decentralized decision-making through AI. Join us in revolutionizing DAO operations with the power of artificial intelligence.

speakers.name: Pat
